product_name: Columbia Take Me There T-Shirt - Girls'
long_description: The girls' Columbia Take Me There T-shirt adds brings performance fabric to a traditional tee that feels as soft as cotton but works hard to keep up with her activity level. Omni-Wick(TM) polyester fabric draws moisture away from skin and allows it to evaporate quickly from the surface of the fabric so she stays dry and comfortable. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection from the Omni-Shade(TM) technology continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays so she stays safe no matter how long her day lasts. The Columbia Take Me There T-shirt dries quickly, making it ideal for traveling, camping or backpacking.
short_description: The girls' Columbia Take Me There T-shirt adds brings performance fabric to a traditional tee that feels as soft as cotton but works hard to keep up with her activity level.
